item.title: Favorite Johor Food Places
item.author: Author
item.description: This is a listing of my favorite food places in Klang Valley. China Cuisine Restoran Fu Cheng 福成 Address: 6, Jalan 1/77b, Jalan Changkat Thambi Dollah, 55100 Kuala Lumpur Pork Noodle Omega Pork Noodle @ Sri Petaling Address: No 74, Ground Floor, Jalan Radin Tengah, Bandar Baru Sri Petaling, 57000 Kuala Lumpur Vegetarian Cameleon Beancurd Vegetarian Restaurant 甘味林素食餐厅 Address: 1, Jalan Thamboosamy, Off, Jalan Putra, Wilayah Persekutuan, 50350 Kuala Lumpur
